w:r.w:t: Framework is a code structure that makes code maintenance easy and efficient. It is collection of reusable components used to develop the test cases.

Generic Components is one of the automation framework components which is common for all the application. Its collection of generic class contains reusable methods / libraries. The methods which can be used to any application is called Generic/common methods
Generic libraries are common to all automation project
No need to remember the syntax every
just create once & use multiple times

Base class consists of all the configuration annotations which is mainly used to perform operations like connect to Data base, precondition, Launching Browser, Login to application, Logout of application, close the browser, Close data base connection. We create this operations using configuration annotations like @BeforeSuite, @BeforeTest, @BeforeClass, @Befo

This utility consists of Generic methods and is mainly used to perform all database operations like connect to database, disconnect database, execute query, update query and execute query based on query and it will verify the data.

In my project we stored all the test data in Microsoft Excel in sheet, row and cell format to fetch the Test data from excel and run the script we used Excel utility. It consists of generic methods which is used to perform some operations on excel sheet.

Main purpose of file Utility is to fetch the common data which is common throughout the suite like URL, username, password. In File utility we will have generic methods to get the value from property File and here we give key as parameter and it re
turns the data in string format to the called method.

is an interface which is store the common variables which is used to run the generic methods, here we store variables like excel path, property file path, consisting of some values. The main purpose of creating a variable is these values or Dynamic and can be updated time to time rather than changing in the script which is tedious job we create an interface and store the values, which will be secure
Java Utility consists of Java libraries which is used to perform java related operations like to generate random number, generate date according to format.

. Here we make use of counter and retry limit variables. Counter is
initialization value, retry limit value is limit value given by the developer.
is a generic class, which contains web driver specific reusable actions like
launches the specified browser like chrome,
waits implicitly till the page is loaded
opens the application based on the entered URL
takes the screenshot of the mentioned page, generally used for failed test cases
it’s an explicit wait. Waits till the element is visible on web page

) : used to select the value from the drop-down based on index

used to Switch to Any Window based on Window Titl

and we should replace particular data with this
As per the rule of the automation, we should not hardcode
elements within test Scripts instead, we should get elements from Object Repository, because in Agile process due to frequent requirement changes, modification & maintenance of elements is tedious
we created a class and stored all the elements of that particular user story in that class using @FindBy
Inside this class we keep methods to perform common operation/Business operations like creat
, login, logout of that particular user story
We can directly store Web Elements in java class

Common data is used to store common values which is used throughout the framework and can be modified easily whenever build is moved from one server to another server. We use property files to store common data here the data will be stored in the form of key and value. By creating reference variable for
value of that key from property file.

which is used to establish connection between selenium
executable file which is used to launch the chrome browser

Test script consists of @Test once after executing @BeforeSuite, @BeforeTest, @BeforeMethod @Test will
get executed that is it will perform action on the application with the help of POM class methods, General utilities and Test data.

TestNG.xml file is a configuration file that helps in organizing tests. It allows testers to create and handle multiple test classes, define test suites and tests. It makes a tester's job easier by controlling the
execution of tests by putting all the test cases
together and run it under one XML file. It consists of series of xml code which starts from suit tag, test tag, class tag
We had different TestNG.xml files for different operations depending on the execution type like Batch execution, smoke execution, Regression execution, Regional Regression execution, Parallel
execution, Distributed parallel execution. Once after executing the
reports in test-output folder, it consists of

TestNG, by default, generates multiple reports as part of its test execution. These reports mainly include TestNG HTML report, TestNG email-able report, TestNG report XML, and JUnit report XML files. These files
can be found under the test-output report folder.
In real time if the test case gets failed then we have to capture the screenshot of it to capture the screenshot we use
is an interface and it consist of one abstract
). Since we need this operation only when test case fails we use
class where we provide screenshot implementation for
) to take screenshot if test case fails.
pom.xml is an xml file which is used to add dependencies from maven repository. Using this we can easily add plugins to

In my project we mainly used pom.xml to add dependencies and whenever the plugin gets a new version, we used to just change the version name and save the project the plugin used to get updated. Whenever we create a maven
project by default pom.xml will be present, here we will store all plugins. Once after downloading all the plugins will be added in maven dependencies folder in .jar format.
tool which is used to run the frame work
In framework we design several reusable generic codes and store them in libraries. This feature helps testers to develop the test scripts faster as they need not write thousands of
of test scripts. They can rely on these libraries.

Using generic utilities and POM business libraries test scripts can be optimized. We store all the reusable codes in generic utilities and elements and business libraries in POM pages and invoke these libraries in the test scripts whenever needed reducing the number of lines of code.
all the reusable codes for several web based actions, codes to read data from Excel and property files which facilitates reusability of these codes to several test scripts.
Maintenance and Modification of Test Data is
Since all the test data is stored separately in Excel and property file, we can maintain and modify this data easily without disturbing the actual test scripts.
Maintenance and Modification of web elements is
way to store all the web elements and respective business libraries which facilitates easy maintenance and modification of the addresses of the elements. It also helps to handle

Frameworks focuses primarily on improving code quality and readability. In addition to providing the most efficient way to code and develop test scripts, frameworks facilitate easy debugging and software maintenance.
Selenium has built-in support for debugging.
Framework provides predefined template which makes it easy to develop the test scripts and code efficiency.
Screenshots for failed test scripts can be
We have a generic method in web driver utility which enables us to take the screenshot of the failed test scripts. This method can be associated with the
implementation class and generate the screenshot of failed test script when testNG.xml file is executed.
We can rerun the failed test scripts using
interface. We provide implementation to the only method
) in this class and rerun the failed test scripts as many times as we wish.
TestNG has a built-in feature which helps in generation of html reports automatically when xml file is executed. Apart from this we can also collaborate Extent Reports to generate both high level and
reports using which we can analyse test reports of several test scripts easily.
TestNG enables us to execute the test scripts on different browsers in parallel. This feature makes it easy to perform browser compatibility testing.
tool we can perform batch execution. This tool generates .xml file automatically and we can customize this file to execute the complete test suite.
Framework is a well-organized structural collection of all the reusable components which acts like a template to develop and execute the test scripts with great ease.

My framework is a Hybrid framework which is the combination of Data Driven, Method Driven and Modular Driven frameworks. We used Selenium-Java Client Binding. Our project is Page Object Model design pattern.

As per the Page Object Model, we have maintained a class for every web page. Each web page has a separate class and that class holds the functionality and members of that web page. Separate classes for every individual test.
have separate classes to store element locators. For the
there would be a separate class which calls the methods from the

.java) deals with all the common functions used by all the pages. This class is responsible for loading the configurations from properties files, Initializing the WebDriver, Implicit Waits, Extent Reports, and also to create the object of
pointing towards the file from which the data should be read.
stores and handles the functions which can be commonly used across the entire framework. The reason behind creating a utility class is to achieve reusability
Property file stores the information that remains static throughout the framework such as browser-specific information, application URL, etc.
All the details which change as per the environment and authorization such as URL, Login Credentials are kept in this file. Keeping these details in a separate file makes it easy to maintain
Screenshots will be captured and stored in a separate folder and also the screenshots of failed test cases will be added to the extent rep
All the test data will be kept in an excel sheet (
, we pass test data and handle data-driven testing. We use
We used TestNG for Assertions, Grouping, and Parallel execution.
We used Maven for build, execution, and dependency purpose. Integrating the TestNG dependency in the
(Continuous Development) Tool, we execute test cases on a daily basis

For the reporting purpose, we are using Extent Reports. It generates beautiful HTML reports. We use the extent reports for maintaining logs and also to include the screenshots of failed test cases in the Extent Report.
